note:
I'm an artist who specializes in the natural world, especially animals...I paint in oil and gouache; also love to draw & sketch (sometimes with vintage dip pen nibs & ink). Graphic designer & illustrator in the 20th century.
Happy in Redwood Country with my spouse, two rough collies and one 17 yr. old calico cat. Love to garden.
Lucky to have traveled a lot...Japan, Hong Kong, England, France, Portugal, Germany, Sweden, Romania, twelve trips to Mongolia, two to Kenya.
